hopobject.name: Debian
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.4 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/22.0.1229.79 Safari/537.4
hopobject.body:
Debian is the universal operating system, with many packages pre-compiled for many architectures.

http://www.debian.org/ports/arm/

InstallingDebianOn article for BeagleBone: Debian wiki instructions

As of March 5, 2014, BeagleBoard.org is providing customized Debian images on the Latest Images Page and making plans to include those images on production BeagleBone Black boards on the on-board eMMC.

For instructions on rebuilding those images, see http://beagleboard.org/source.
hopobject.shortdesc: Official Debian build shipped with BeagleBone Black as well as Debian for BeagleBoard, BeagleBoard-xM and BeagleBone
